question: Who is the first Chief of Defence Staff?
option2: Air Chief Marshal Birender Singh Dhanoa
explanation: On December 30, 2019, the Indian Army Chief, General Bipin Rawat was appointed as Indiaâ€™s first Chief of Defence Staff (CDS). CDS is a 4-star single-point military advisor to the Ministry of Defence and will serve until the maximum age of 65 years.
